SELECT f.fund_id as fundId, f.product_id as productId, f.project_id as projectId, f.progress as progress, f.launch_at as launchAt, f.end_at as endAt, f.financial_institution as financialInstitution, f.retry_votes_count as retryVotesCount, fp.name as name, fp.detail as detail, fp.fund_type as fundType, fp.join_condition as productCondition, s.period_days as periodDays, s.interest_rate as interestRate, s.success_condition as successCondition, d.recipient as recipient, d.usage_plan as usagePlan, d.min_donation_amount as minDonationAmount, d.max_donation_amount as maxDonationAmount, d.target_amount as targetAmount, l.loan_limit as loanLimit, l.repayment_start_date as repaymentStartDate, l.repayment_end_date as repaymentEndDate, l.min_interest_rate as minInterestRate, l.max_interest_rate as maxInterestRate, l.reward as loanReward, l.reward_condition as loanRewardCondition, c.challenge_period_days as challengePeriodDays, c.reward as challengeReward, c.reward_condition as challengeRewardCondition FROM fund f INNER JOIN financial_product fp ON f.product_id = fp.product_id LEFT JOIN savings s ON fp.product_id = s.product_id AND fp.fund_type = 'SAVINGS' LEFT JOIN donation d ON fp.product_id = d.product_id AND fp.fund_type = 'DONATION' LEFT JOIN loan l ON fp.product_id = l.product_id AND fp.fund_type = 'LOAN' LEFT JOIN challenge c ON fp.product_id = c.product_id AND fp.fund_type = 'CHALLENGE' WHERE f.fund_id = #{fundId}
